name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 125
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, This is the Way. The creed of the Mandalorian, with colors inspired by the hit Star Wars Show.
